meanings.sent1: Her profligacies with money led to her financial troubles.
meanings.sent2: The company's profligacies in spending resulted in bankruptcy.
meanings.sent3: His profligacies with snacks at the party were legendary.
meanings.sent4: The profligacies of nature's beauty never cease to amaze me.
meanings.sent5: The profligacies of the royal family were the talk of the town.

meanings.sent2: The novel delves into the profligacies of the main character.
meanings.sent3: The profligacies of the mischievous cat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the villain's profligacies were his downfall.
meanings.sent5: The profligacies of the gossiping neighbors were causing trouble.
